name: Sravya Vulisetty
tagline: Dedicated Front-End Developer skilled at creating smooth user interfaces and dynamic web applications using React
description: I am a Front-end developer with experience specializing in Web development. Throughout my career, I have utilized my skills to design dynamic user interfaces, develop efficient web applications, and seamlessly integrate front-end systems with backend APIs.

experience.title: Front-end developer
experience.description: I developed a help-desk application with features like incident creation, real-time monitoring, and service request management. Using React.js and React-Router, I designed user-friendly pages and managed state with React Hooks. I visualized performance metrics with React Charts and optimized the interface with HTML5, CSS3, and Tailwind CSS.

experience.title: Web developer-intern
experience.description: I created a platform for students to explore, learn, and engage in technical topics and events. The site includes articles, informative posts, quizzes, and event updates to foster a dynamic learning environment. I developed a user-friendly, responsive website and collaborated on its architecture. Key features include an engaging landing page, registration and contact forms with client-side validation, and an interactive quiz feature.

projects.title: Admin Dashboard
projects.subtitle: A web-based admin dashboard for managing user data and visualizing key metrics using React and Chart.js.

projects.title: Movies API
projects.subtitle: A React-Redux application that fetches and displays movie data from an external API, with features like search and filters.

projects.title: Score shuffler
projects.subtitle: An application for managing and shuffling scores, providing an intuitive interface for updating and displaying scores dynamically.
